## Join the Open Science Team {#join-open-science-team}

The Open Science Team includes a diverse set of participants who contribute feedback and ideas throughout module development. Team members may participate in:

- reviewing learning materials and providing user-centered feedback
- attending review sessions and community meetings
- contributing ideas for community engagement and dissemination
- developing community generated lessons

If you are interested in joining, please fill out the [Participant Google Form](https://forms.gle/f37czjzqBqvT3Gjw8).

## Why Join Us? {#why-join-us}

By getting involved with SCHOOL, you can:

- help shape open, reusable learning modules that demonstrate the data science life cycle using NASA Earth science data and tools
- contribute to inclusive, community-driven open science training
- connect with a network of developers, scientists, educators, and community partners focused on open science outcomes in learning

Please connect with us at [TOPSTSCHOOL\@ciesin.columbia.edu](mailto:TOPSTSCHOOL@ciesin.columbia.edu)
